title: New AI Chip In Making Claims It Will Revolutionise ChatGPT
content: 'Sohu' claims to be 20 times faster in running transformers like ChatGPT than Nvidia's flagship- H100s, betting on transformer ASIC (Application Specific Integrated Circuits) chipset.

title: What Trump Rally Shooter Did On Last Day Of His Life
content: The 20-year-old who allegedly tried to assassinate former US President Donald Trump at his campaign rally, made a series of stops in and around to collect arms and ammunition before the incident, the CNN reported.
summary: The 20-year-old who allegedly tried to assassinate former US President Donald Trump at his campaign rally, made a series of stops in and around to collect arms and ammunition before the incident, the CNN reported.

title: 3 Police Snipers Spotted Trump Attacker Minutes Before He Opened Fire
content: With investigators still searching for clues about what may have led Thomas Matthew Crooks to attack Donald Trump, new details that have emerged in the case show that the 20-year-old was spotted by three police snipers minutes before he opened fire.
summary: With investigators still searching for clues about what may have led Thomas Matthew Crooks to attack Donald Trump, new details that have emerged in the case show that the 20-year-old was spotted by three police snipers minutes before he opened fire.

title: World's Rarest Whale Washes Up On New Zealand Beach
content: The body of a spade-toothed whale -- a species so rare it has never been seen alive -- appears to have washed up on a New Zealand beach, scientists say.
summary: The body of a spade-toothed whale -- a species so rare it has never been seen alive -- appears to have washed up on a New Zealand beach, scientists say.

title: The Stunning Reason Why Our Days Are Becoming Longer
content: It's well known that as far as the climate crisis goes, time is of the essence. Now a study out Monday shows that the melting of the polar ice caps is causing our planet to spin more slowly, increasing the length of days at an "unprecedented" rate.
summary: It's well known that as far as the climate crisis goes, time is of the essence. Now a study out Monday shows that the melting of the polar ice caps is causing our planet to spin more slowly, increasing the length of days at an "unprecedented" rate.

title: These Men Are Loneliest At The Workplace, Suggests New Research

title: Former Boxer's Single Punch Results In UK Man's Permanent Brain Injury

title: Trump Vice President Pick JD Vance Supports Big Tech Antitrust Crackdown

title: Unsinkable: Trump Riding Wave Of Wins
